channel.title: John Lennon Song 'God'
channel.description:
Ok soo look at the lyric's to this song:
God is a Concept by which we measure our pain I'll say it again God is a Concept by which we measure our pain I don't believe in magic I don't believe in I-ching I don't believe in Bible I don't believe in Tarot I don't believe in Hitler I don't believe in Jesus I don't believe in Kennedy I don't believe in Buddha I don't believe in Mantra I don't believe in Gita I don't believe in Yoga I don't believe in Kings I don't believe in Elvis I don't believe in Zimmerman I don't believe in Beatles I just believe in me...and that reality The dream is over What can I say? the Dream is Over Yesterday I was the Dreamweaver But now I'm reborn I was the Walrus But now I'm John and so dear friends you'll just have to carry on The Dream is over
Notice " I dont believe in zimmerman" Dont you find that funny that there is a trial on http://abcnews.go.com/US/george-zimmerman-tells-trayvon-martins-parents/story?id=16177849 They were over 30+ years apart... Coincidence?

@_bool wrote:

(Anthony):

ps zimmerman is bob dylan’s actual surname and that’s who he was referring to

i said what he was referring to, which obviously fits the context…

Read full topic

item.title: John Lennon Song 'God'
item.dc:creator: @johnl17 johnl17
item.description:
@johnl17 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:23, topic:440203”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=542881.msg3980509#msg3980509 date=1335208593]
he was probably talking about this:

en.wikipedia.org

Zimmermann Telegram

The Zimmermann Telegram (or Zimmermann Note or Zimmerman Cable) was a secret diplomatic communication issued from the German Foreign Office in January 1917 that proposed a military alliance between Germany and Mexico in the prior event of the United States entering World War I against Germany. Mexico would recover Texas, Arizona, and New Mexico. The proposal was intercepted and decoded by British intelligence. Revelation of the contents enraged American public opinion, especially after the German...


[/quote]I said this[/quote]
Ahh didnt see that… well your added to my respect list.

Read full topic

item.title: John Lennon Song 'God'
item.dc:creator: @johnl17 johnl17
item.description:
@johnl17 wrote:

Ok soo look at the lyric’s to this song:

God is a Concept by which we measure our pain I'll say it again God is a Concept by which we measure our pain I don't believe in magic I don't believe in I-ching I don't believe in Bible I don't believe in Tarot I don't believe in Hitler I don't believe in Jesus I don't believe in Kennedy I don't believe in Buddha I don't believe in Mantra I don't believe in Gita I don't believe in Yoga I don't believe in Kings I don't believe in Elvis I don't believe in Zimmerman I don't believe in Beatles I just believe in me...and that reality

The dream is over
What can I say?
the Dream is Over
Yesterday
I was the Dreamweaver
But now I’m reborn
I was the Walrus
But now I’m John
and so dear friends
you’ll just have to carry on
The Dream is over

Notice " I dont believe in zimmerman"
Dont you find that funny that there is a trial on http://abcnews.go.com/US/george-zimmerman-tells-trayvon-martins-parents/story?id=16177849

They were over 30+ years apart…

Coincidence?

Read full topic
